author: The Spiffing Brit
description:
A Huge thank you to Lost Eidolons Veil of the witch for sponsoring this video you can checkout their very cool TRPG here: https://bit.ly/LostEidolons_VeiloftheWitch_TheSpiﬃngBrit
I have also been given some keys from the developers to giveaway for free so keep an eye out for those in the comments!

Welcome ladies and gentleman to a lovely visit into the world of age of wonders 4 a 4x grand strategy game similar to civilization 6 but instead of human civilisation being the focus you are instead a fantasy race. In our case we are becoming a faction of dwarves who are under the rule of a very money focused dragon that just wants to collect all of the wealth in the world. Now Age of wonders 4 is a 4x game meaning its all about expanding and exploiting resources in order to explore and then conquer your opponents before they fight back. 

Of course Today I the spiffing brit want to see if paradox interactive have made a perfectly balanced game with no exploits or if with the mindset of an
title: Pro Exploiter Vs 4X Strategy Game - Age Of Wonders 4 Is Perfectly Balanced
